website_summaries.verdict: An affordable dual-flush toilet from one of Kohler's most popular series of products.
pros: Round bowl is ideal for smaller spaces
We love the dual-function option for water conservation/efficiency
cons: The bowl is shorter and smaller than some other options and may not be for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Poor bowl cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two toilets from Amazon. The Kohler Wellworth round front dual flush for a small powder room and a elongated bowl Toto single flush for the master bath. The Toto works great and has very good bowl cleaning. The Kohler however does a poor job of bowl cleaning. The short, liquid flush is adequate but the main flush is disappointing. By the way both toilets are 1.6/gpf. Wish I had purchased two Toto's. The Kohler was also $50.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: denandbert

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toilet! Our last toilet we had we had ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toilet! Our last toilet we had we had to unclog it every time and I mean EVERYTIME we used it to do #2. It got soooo frustrating. We just kept the plunger next to the toilet and it got plenty of use. Now with this toilet we have not had to use the plunger even 1 time. So it wasn't cause we had unusually large #2's, it was the toilet! This thing takes everything we can dump into it.
customer_reviews.author: Helinut

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost a year. I wanted something nice looking, smaller in size, with great flushing abilities and didn't break the bank (after all- it IS a toilet). This fits the bill perfectly. The lid came with some marks on it - so I emailed the manufacture and they promptly sent me a replacement. Just remember you will need to buy your own toilet seat. I will replace my other toilets in the house with this one. (Did I just write a review for a toilet? LMAO)
customer_reviews.author: -connie-

customer_reviews.title: Flushes great.
customer_reviews.text: As perfect as it gets! I purchased this to replace a "comfort" height toilet that I hated. You are not supposed to go to the bathroom while practically standing! This one is still a little higher than our old one, but this is about as low as is available within our price range. It flushes great and I like that there are 2 handles for flushing. Does the job. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Deliriart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kohler Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toilet for our small bathroom. Arrived promptly in perfect condition. Installed in less than an hour. Works as advertised. The dual-flush feature is a must-have! Unlike our builder-grade toilet, the bowl stays clean because the water flow is perfect. Having the flush handle on the side leaves room on top which is necessary for storage/decor. Wish I had purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Madd Maxx

customer_reviews.title: nothing special
customer_reviews.text: arrived as.promised. expected from reviews that this toilet would have a powerful flush. It does NOT. Maybe I just cannot get used to these water saving toilets it the last 10 years. They flush unreliable. I don't thing there is enough water in the bowl prior to flushing that does anything to accelerate or make a difference in the emptying or flushing of content. I wish they would work like public toilets. With these...like most of the older ...i have to hold handle down until bowl empties in order to get complete flush
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Should've upgraded to this sooner!  :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this toilet. Don't know why I didn't upgrade years earlier, but really glad that this was what I upgraded to. The dual flush works perfect (better than the retrofit kit on my old toilet), and the flush power is great! Even the action of flushing is quieter, which was an unexpected plus. The design is simple and subtle and would work well in most situations.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaDogg

customer_reviews.title: I love this toilet
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older toilet that had little to no flushing power. This toilet is great. Flushes completely every time and It has the two flush water saving option. We have saved so much water in the four months since we installed it. It was very easy to put in, also. Very pleased with this purchase and will probably buy another for our master bath.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saylor

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's probably a good toilet because Kohler is a good brand ----- BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's probably a good toilet because Kohler is a good brand ----- BUT ----- they only sent me the tank and half a toilet won't do so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: G. C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No seat!
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with the toilet seat. I should’ve read the details carefully. However it is a great product and so far it hasn’t given any problems and was very easy to install. Purchased a toilet seat at a nearby store.
customer_reviews.author: MonSan

customer_reviews.title: Their quality assurance is horrible. Two out of two ordered and both defective
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because we wanted the dual flush. The first one had a large glob of porcelain stuck to the base so we had it sent back. There couldn't be a problem with the next one we ordered could there?-wrong it had grey specks all over the bowl. Their quality assurance is horrible. Two out of two ordered and both defective. SO, we went with American Standard. It had a defect on the top so we ordered another so we could replace its top. Now we have a toilet without defects. What's wrong with companies these days? Does Amazon get second tier items?
customer_reviews.author: SWF

customer_reviews.title: Kohler Hit It Out Of The Park On This One
customer_reviews.text: I just love this commode and it saves a lot of water throughout the year. It's also easy to install if you will purchase a foam rubber seal vice a wax seal to install. Check with Lowes or online for a product called "Sani Seal" and you'll be glad you did. No need for plumber.
customer_reviews.author: drjwleejr

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best...and very easy to keep clean. (Be sure to check with yours local county for rebate because it's a water saver, yet very "strong". In ours it qualifies and can receive $50 back!)
customer_reviews.author: bob morris

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and adds to the cleanliness of the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and installed easily - though always be careful with the wax ring installation - ours slipped off after a few days. If you do it yourself, just be sure to watch for leaks. We didn't have wax ring and so forth included - just so you are aware for planning your installation. It's a low water version, so just be aware. For those that may have a propensity to skid marks, it may take two flushes!
customer_reviews.author: MK Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great, efficient toilet!
customer_reviews.text: Compact and works great! I don't feel guilty anymore about wasting water because the old one would go on and on and on filling up. So far I have never had to use the whole flush because it is so efficient. Best thing I have bought this year. No more water wasting!
customer_reviews.author: Jackieruby

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Installed this over a month ago, and seems to be holding up fine. I like the dual flush mode to save money on the water bill. Will see how it holds up in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet for a water restricted toilet in everything restricted Kalifornia. Glazed trap helps Kohler good stuff and gives you the option of just flushing liquids or ...
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: So glad we spent the extra money on the black. Bathroom is very cool in black and gray. Toilet works great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought Kohler was a top line company that's why I went with this toilet. Never again! Anything solid plugs it up. All the adjustments are correct and it still plugs. As soon as something solid goes in I flush right away and it still plugs. Don't wait until you're done or you'll really be in trouble!!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller stool then I expected but the operation is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Its a smaller stool then I expected but the operation is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: allen h donaldson

customer_reviews.title: but it's a beautiful toilet. Very compact for our micro bathroom and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a toilet, but it's a beautiful toilet. Very compact for our micro bathroom and I love the dual flush.
customer_reviews.author: MrsDeezy

customer_reviews.title: Great price on this toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very good price - my plumber said he could not get it nearly as cheap. It installed easily and I really like the two flush options.
customer_reviews.author: LilyWoolf

customer_reviews.title: I have only received the bottom part of the toilet ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only received the bottom part of the toilet. The top was not received spoke to Kohler and they suggested I talk to you. Where is the rest of my toilet?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flush
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of research for a nice looking toilet with good flush power. This is a powerful toilet and the #1/#2 flush options both work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than we even expected. Very efficient flush. No clogs since we installed this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation. Works well in our remodeled bathroom. Make sure to buy a seat separately that fits (there are a few sizes you can get).
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dual Flush Feature
customer_reviews.text: I love the dual flush feature of this toilet. You can use 2 different flushes to save water. A .5 gallon savings when you only need to flush liquid.
customer_reviews.author: JWBL

customer_reviews.title: Noisy flushing.
customer_reviews.text: Toilet is good looking but mechanizum inside for flushing is clunky, noisy and incomplete flushing sometimes. Requires second noisy flush. Looking for new inside hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Beswick

customer_reviews.title: 3years and no problem
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 3 years now and no problems and no clogs. I did just have to replace flushing mechanism in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: In the middle of a renovation, this toilet sat in the box. for a while, just opened it and it is broken..
customer_reviews.author: andrew parks

customer_reviews.title: but really is a great unit. The flush works great for us
customer_reviews.text: My wife thought this was a little low at first, but really is a great unit. The flush works great for us, much better that a top bottun.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: 5$ Footlong
customer_reviews.text: Great place to push one out, also doesn’t get all grimy like the white ones. Obviously still needs cleaning periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Money

customer_reviews.title: A potty you can actually sit on without a step ladder.....
customer_reviews.text: This one is only 14 1/2 inches high......I'm only 4'10" on tiptoes....naturally....I LOVE IT!!!!!!!! Delivery was by commercial truck. They brought it to the door exactly as scheduled and even brought it inside for me. SOOOOOO nice to get prompt, kind, friendly, polite, courteous delivery these days. I would recommend this item and this company whole-heartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: Toilet did not come with toilet seat and it came in two separate boxes
customer_reviews.text: The product did not have toilet seat. The color was off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for a smaller bathroom. Sits a little lower so ideal for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nkem

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! The toilet seat was not in any of 2 boxes shipped. Also an important part, volt was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J

customer_reviews.title: The packaging from Kohler was excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well made and seems to work well It will get tested very soon. The packaging from Kohler was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Old in the North East

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet! Quiet and has great flushing power. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Portillo

customer_reviews.title: No better toilet for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet I've ever owned. Quick, quiet, efficient and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Munczek

customer_reviews.title: Side handle helps with young children
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a gut renovation of a small bathroom. We wanted the round front to give just a little more clearance for moving through the bathroom. We wanted a dual-flush system, but we have young children who won't be able to reach the top of the tank for a couple more years. The side flush handle is perfect for that and allows us keep a tissue box on top of the tank instead of taking up our counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Koehler toilet tank and bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great product , quality and price. Best of free delivery and good customer service
customer_reviews.author: Shan Sundaram

customer_reviews.title: and everything looks fantastic. Plumber even commented on how nice this toilet ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed with our new bath fitter, and everything looks fantastic. Plumber even commented on how nice this toilet was. We are extremely pleased and will be buying another for our half bath!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun & Debra

customer_reviews.title: great toilet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toilet. We replaced an old 5 gallon with this. Install was easy. We are getting used to the small amount of water needed. Instead of several minutes to fill the tank by the time you walk out of the bathroom the water has long stopped filling. The dual flush saves even more water.
customer_reviews.author: StacieM

customer_reviews.title: good looking, but flush button is a plastic -- ...
customer_reviews.text: good looking, but flush button is a plastic -- a bit cheap looking, and changing is not easy, because it's double switch.
customer_reviews.author: Changsu Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good for the small bathroom we put ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Good for the small bathroom we put it in. The dual flush works fine.
customer_reviews.author: p and j

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the option of a flush using less water. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just had toilet installed and it is cracked on the side where handle is .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carey

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-3987-96 Wellworth Two-Piece Round-Front Dual-Flush Toilet with Class Five Flush System and Left-Hand Trip Lever, Biscuit
product_meta.description:
Color:BiscuitThis Wellworth dual-flush toilet combines water savings with powerful flush performance. An innovative two-tone flush lever offers the choice of 1.1 or 1.6-Gallons per flush; the dual-flush lever is located on the side of the tank like a traditional toilet, leaving the top free for storage. The high-efficiency 1.1-Gallon flush reduces water use by more than 30-Percent over the 1.6-Gallon mode, which adds up to potential water savings of more than 4,000-Gallons per toilet, per year. Technology Dual-flush technology allows you to choose between a full- or partial-flush. Installation Standard 12-inch rough-in. Three-bolt installation. Water Conservation & Rebates WaterSense toilets meet strict EPA flushing guidelines, including using at least 20 percent less water than 1.6-gallon toilets. Eligible for consumer rebates in some municipalities.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Wellworth dual-flush toilet combines water savings with powerful flush performance. An innovative two-tone flush lever offers the choice of 1.1 or 1.6-Gallons per flush; the dual-flush lever is located on the side of the tank like a traditional toilet, leaving the top free for storage. The high-efficiency 1.1-Gallon flush reduces water use by more than 30-Percent over the 1.6-Gallon mode, which adds up to potential water savings of more than 4,000-Gallons per toilet, per year.
feature_bullets: Round-front bowl offers an ideal solution for smaller baths and powder rooms
Left-hand nested trip lever offers a choice of 1.1 or 1.6-Gallons per flush
2-1/8-Inch glazed trap way.For back-to-back toilet installations: Use only a45° double wye fitting
Coordinates with other products in the Wellworth collection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
